AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Whispering Claw student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In the temple of the two-moons dance, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the art of the Claw-Dance. As an adept of the Whispering Claw, they studied the methods of silent kills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Desert Rain student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In the temple of the two-moons dance, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the art of the Claw-Dance. As an adept of the Desert Rain, while the other kittens played, this one studied the blade.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Goutfang student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In the temple of the two-moons dance, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the art of the Claw-Dance. As an adept of the Goutfang, they grappled with the balance of combat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Desert Wind student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In the temple of the Desert Wind Adeptonium, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the art of the Claw-Dance. As an adept of the Desert Wind, they balanced the blades well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: War monk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always ready to defend their home, using their Claw-Dance to repel the recently returned Maormer pirates. On their days off, they would teach the young to be ready to do the same.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Monk scribe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While the other monks danced, [PAWN_nameDef] memorialised their techniques in script for future generations to see. Some of the copies had to be replaced after the kittens spilled paint over them amidst play.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Assassin Monk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Few were as deadly as [PAWN_nameDef], an assassin of the Whispering Claw school. Rumors say that they purred loudly on a successful kill.
